name: Creighton University
affiliations: NCAA Division I – Big East | nickname = Bluejays | mascot = Billy the Bluejay
THE_WSJ: Creighton men's basketball home game, CHI Health Center Omaha|260x Creighton competes in NCAA Division I athletics as a member of the Big East. Nicknamed the Bluejays, Creighton fields 14 teams in eight sports. Bruce Rasmussen is the Director of Athletics.
